ygData.subject: RE: Pottery Nerfed?
ygData.msgSnippet: As of late, the failure rate has been MUCH higher. On saturday after 5 batches of 20 attempts, I was average 5-6 fails per 20. Then, on Sunday I hit 20 for 20.
ygData.messageBody:
As of late, the failure rate has been MUCH higher. On saturday after 5
batches of 20 attempts, I was average 5-6 fails per 20. Then, on Sunday I
hit 20 for 20. Go figure. I think it will get nerfed soon. I think this
filure rate is an interim fix until they can adjust the price of the sketch.

Graedon
-----Original Message-----
From: Elena Glenn [mailto:braveheart@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 12:46 PM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Pottery Nerfed?


I am a master potter in Halas. This morning I logged on and went to make
my usual 15 pie tins. Out of the 15, I had 7 misses. I am thinking it has
been nerfed, as brewing was. Would anyone else try and let me know if
you've had the same experience, please? Thanks.

Liliel
Xegony
